body:
Starting with 2020, the tar files are named v2020.0.tar.gz,
v2020.1.tar.gz, etc, not 2020_U1.tar.gz.

https://github.com/intel/tbb/releases

The previous commit (7a10478708) fixed the checksum mismatch, but
didn't update url_for_version (my bad).

----------

Sorry I didn't notice the name change and fix url_for_version() in the
previous commit.  Intel provides the old names for compatibility, so
it looked like the old names were correct.  :-(

The contents of the two tar files (2020_U1.tar.gz and v2020.1.tar.gz)
are identical except for the top-level directory name.  But that's
enough to change the sha sum.

Better to adapt sooner rather than later I guess.

ping @tgamblin who reviewed the previous commit
title: intel-tbb: update to new tar file names for 2020 versions
